article.title: October 2014 Galaxy Newsletter
article.content:
A lot is happening in in the Galaxy in October, and a lot of good stuff happened in September too. Take a look at the October 2014 Galaxy Newsletter for the complete story, but here are some highlights:

  • Galaxy needs your input! You may even get rewarded for your input ...
  • IRC channel to be logged, starting this month
  • Slides from ECCB'14 and upcoming events
  • 71 new papers, including 6 featured papers
  • Who's Hiring? Lots of places, that's who
  • Two new public Galaxy Servers
  • New Deployment Catalog and Log Board entries
  • 36 new ToolShed repos
  • And a smattering of other news too

Happy October!

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
